reviews.text: I go there twice a year, every time Im in town for business, the service is great, its clean, the breakfast are very good, a huge international buffet, the only problem is not a problem of the hotel but more of a general chinese problem, if you dont smoke your are going to have a bad time about smokers, they even smoke in elevators!
reviews.title: Nice for the working time spent in guangzhou

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located on the quiet side of Beijing Rd and Zhongshan 5 rd.. Reception and Beijing rd. exit is located on the 2nd floor of hotel. Taxi pickup/drop off in the back streets located on the 1st floor of hotel.
reviews.title: Had a great stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel in late Aug. We booked through Ctrip and has no issues at all. We requested a non-smoking room which was provided.
reviews.title: Good location and swimming pool

reviews.text: - Location: good. Lots shops around having located on the major shopping strip - Beijing Road. Yet room is quiet, we didn't hear any traffic noise at all.
reviews.title: 'nice surprise'

reviews.text: - Nice size swimming pool (25m). It is free to guests and also opens to public with a fee. Swimming caps are required.
